description: Translates the input text from the source language to the target language.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Input text in UTF-8 encoding. It is a list so that multiple paragraphs can be submitted. Also accept a single string, instead of an array, as valid input.

parameters.name: model_id
parameters.description: The unique model_id of the translation model being used to translate text. The model_id inherently specifies source language, target language, and domain. If the model_id is specified, there is no need for the source and target parameters and the values are ignored.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Used in combination with target as an alternative way to select the model for translation. When target and source are set, and model_id is not set, the system chooses a default model with the right language pair to translate (usually the model based on the news domain).

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Used in combination with source as an alternative way to select the model for translation. When target and source are set, and model_id is not set, the system chooses a default model with the right language pair to translate (usually the model based on the news domain).
